content.title: Asangathit Karmakaar Mrtyu Evan Divyaang Sahaayata Yojana
content.details: In 2019, Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme 'Asangathit Karmakaar Mrtyu Evan Divyaang Sahaayata Yojana' for unorganized workers. With this scheme, families will be able to get financial benefits after the death or disability of the unorganized worker.
eligibility: Unorganized workers must be between the ages of 18 and 60.
Unorganized workers must be registered as beneficiaries under Section 10 (3) of the Act.
Assistance will not be provided in the case of death due to suicide, drug or substance abuse, or death due to fighting with each other with the intent to commit a crime.
Benefits will be given only on the death of the registered worker and not on the death or accident of a family member.
Beneficiaries who have benefited from the Financial Assistance and Rehabilitation Assistance Scheme for unorganized workers suffering from silicosis run by the Board will not be eligible.
documents_required: In case of permanent disability, permanent disability certificate issued by the doctor.

faqs.question: What is this scheme?
faqs.answer: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme 'Asangathit Karmakaar Mrtyu Evan Divyaang Sahaayata Yojana' for unorganized workers on 09 December 2019.

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: With this scheme, families will be able to get financial benefits after the death or disability of the unorganized worker.

faqs.question: What are the benefits?
faqs.answer: Financial Assistance on death or permanent disability.

faqs.question: Who can get the benefits?
faqs.answer: All eligible registered unorganized labor individuals from Chhattisgarh State.

faqs.question: Can applicants get the benefits multiple times?
What is the required age to get the benefits?
faqs.answer: Unorganized workers must be between the ages of 18 and 60.

faqs.question: What is the procedure to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicants must be registered under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Only then can applicants apply for the scheme.

faqs.question: How can applicants register under Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board?
faqs.answer: All applicants have to visit the official website of Chhattisgarh Labour Department, click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board', enter the required details, check eligibility criteria, fill out the online registration form, and submit.

faqs.question: How to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: All applicants have to visit the official website of Chhattisgarh Labour Department, click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board', provide the required details, fill out the application form, and submit.
